# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure.

### Power generation plant at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have sufficient fuel before using them.
- Check the entity status to ensure it is not in a NO_FUEL state.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.
- Check the entity status to ensure it is not in a NO_INGREDIENTS state.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before using it.
- Check the entity status to ensure it is not in a NOT_CONNECTED state.

### Errors when using entities without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that the entities are plugged into an electric network before using them.
- Check the entity status to ensure it is not in a NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK state.

### Errors when using transport belts without items
- Ensure that the transport belts have items to transport before using them.
- Check the entity status to ensure it is not in an EMPTY state.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs.
